remarks: Lemma for ~ wemapso .  Transitivity.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
wemapso.t $e |- T = { <. x , y >. | E. z e. A ( ( x ` z ) S ( y ` z ) /\ A. w e. A ( w R z -> ( x ` w ) = ( y ` w ) ) ) } $.
wemaplem2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
wemaplem2.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. ( B ^m A ) ) $.
wemaplem2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( B ^m A ) ) $.
wemaplem2.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. ( B ^m A ) ) $.
wemaplem2.r $e |- ( ph -> R Or A ) $.
wemaplem2.s $e |- ( ph -> S Po B ) $.
wemaplem2.px1 $e |- ( ph -> a e. A ) $.
wemaplem2.px2 $e |- ( ph -> ( P ` a ) S ( X ` a ) ) $.
wemaplem2.px3 $e |- ( ph -> A. c e. A ( c R a -> ( P ` c ) = ( X ` c ) ) ) $.
wemaplem2.xq1 $e |- ( ph -> b e. A ) $.
wemaplem2.xq2 $e |- ( ph -> ( X ` b ) S ( Q ` b ) ) $.
wemaplem2.xq3 $e |- ( ph -> A. c e. A ( c R b -> ( X ` c ) = ( Q ` c ) ) ) $.
wemaplem2 $p |- ( ph -> P T Q ) $.
